reviewText: I already had the CD version of this recording, but I'm an MTV fan from way back and I really enjoyed the older music videos on this DVD.  All videos were good quality.  I would recommend this DVD to anyone who likes Simply Red.
a MUST BUY for all Simply Red fans, well done videos just for you.
Audio was fantastic. The rest off the DVD spoke for itself. The guy is great.
Great artist. Love his music. Interesting videos.
What can i say simply red gotta love them found songs on here i forgot they had loved it..
Great DVD and really like all the great songs.

Simply Red is/are SIMPLY great. Some REAL classics here.
Sure, I like six of them more than the others, but it's certainly
SIMPLER finding tracks with a CD/DVD/BD-player!
Just what I wanted, great music. I'm a big fan and wonder why He hasn't been a larger hit in USA.
